Widget.name: SpellCheck List
Widget.Description: A simple list that displays the suggestions of the Spell Checker.

Option.name: Widget title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no name is displayed.

Option.name: Query parameter
Option.Description: Specifies the name of the query parameter for the suggested searches.

Option.name: Max number of suggestion
Option.Description: Specifies the maximum number of suggestion to display.
